alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 4:54PM CDT until June 05 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clarke County in east central Mississippi... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 454 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near De Soto, or 7 miles southeast of Quitman, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Shubuta around 500 PM CDT. Quitman and De Soto around 505 PM CDT. Goodwater around 525 PM CDT. Pachuta around 530 PM CDT. Barnett around 535 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
